Name: Canary Flip
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A delightful balance of egg, spirit and wine. Looks creamy and sweet but is sharp and citrusy.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Alex Kammerling, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Canary Flip contains 167 calories
